name: ELEUTHEROMANIA
description:
• ELEUTHEROMANIA is a (Free) prototype of a psychological horror game. 

[Check out the trailer here] ---> 

  • The objective of this game is to provide the feeling of eleutheromania (A mad zeal or irresistible craving for freedom.); but most importantly is to make the player enjoy the game, I hope you guys enjoy my game/prototype.

THERE ARE BUG IN THIS DEMO, IM WORKING ON A FIX, TO FIX MOST OF THE BUGS PLEASE LOAD FROM THE PREVIOUS CHECKPOINT.

CONTROLS:

  • AWSD : Movement
  • L.Shift: Run
  • Q/E : Lean (Left or Right)
  • G : Glowstick
  • F: FlashLight
  • V: Ligher
  • ESC/M: Menu (Game does not stop)
  • Right-Click to use the key (If you have one :p)

Recommended Requirements:

    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: 64 Bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
    • Processor: INTEL CORE i5-4460
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
